extension.description: Notion-inspired knowledge management for VS Code — page tree, outline, full-text search; supports project architecture analysis (CoraWiki) and structured plan writing when used with Cursor.
welcome.pages:
No Markdown files in this workspace yet.
[New note](command:knowledgeBase.newNote)
welcome.outline: Open a Markdown file to see its outline
welcome.search:
Search note content. Single keyword (A) or multiple (A B, space-separated).
Run [Search](command:knowledgeBase.searchNotes) to open the input.
config.showHiddenFiles.description: Show hidden files and folders (dotfiles, except .git)
config.previewOnClick.description: Open preview when clicking a file
config.autoReveal.description: Reveal current file in page tree
config.displayLanguage.description: Interface language. Default: 中文. Set to English to use English. Find under Settings → Cora.
config.coraWiki.baseUrl.description: Base URL for CoraWiki model endpoint
config.coraWiki.apiKeyEnvName.descriptio: Environment variable name that stores the API key
config.coraWiki.fallbackProvider.descrip: Fallback provider when primary provider is unavailable
config.coraWiki.maxSteps.description: Maximum research steps in one run
config.coraWiki.maxTotalTokens.descripti: Maximum total tokens for one CoraWiki run before early finalize
config.coraWiki.cacheTtlSec.description: Cache TTL in seconds for CoraWiki index results
config.coraWiki.pythonTooling.enabled.de: Enable Python tools (extract_import_graph, analyze_complexity) for CoraWiki Agent; default on, skip if no Python
config.coraWiki.pythonPath.description: Path to Python interpreter for CoraWiki Python tools (e.g. python3 or /usr/bin/python3)
coraWiki.pythonNotFound: Python or CoraWiki Python environment not available. Skip Python analysis for this run?
coraWiki.pythonError: Python execution failed: {error}. How to fix?
